If you have problems running the program, follow these steps:
- Download the latest graphics drivers for your computer
- Set your monitor bit depth to 32-bits (or set Phun to 16 bit by adding "System
depth = 16;" to config

cfg, see below)
- Disable any secondary monitors

Try Phun again, if no success, try these things:
- Erase the contents of config
cfg (or create an empty config
cfg if none exists, in the same folder as autoexec
cfg)

- Try setting different resolutions on your monitor
- Try setting these config variables (again, at the end of config

cfg) to different things:
	System

fullscreen = true; // or try false
	System

resolution = [1024, 768]; // or your default resolution
	System

vSync = false;
